item.description:
Late Sunday Lunch at Cafe Luigi
When: Sunday Oct 14 at 2PM
Where: 152 Great Rd Bedford, MA 01730-2725 Phone: (781) 271-0666

ORGANIZER: Biagio (Note: there is a photo of me so you can find me)
CONTACT Biagio: http://socialnetwork....
TARGET AUDIENCE: All Members that like eating good food!

Small restaurant, big Italian taste without going to the North End and fighting/paying for parking! They have an excellent menu, courteous staff and moderate prices. The food that they serve is always very good. The atmosphere is wonderful. Hidden Gem so Enjoy!
item.name: Late Sunday Lunch at Cafe Luigi
